commandDescription: SFDX plugin that changes the owner of a campaign member for a specified campaign to a specific user.
targetcampaignFlagDescription: Salesforce ID of the campaign you want to process
useridtosetFlagDescription: Salesforce ID of the user you want to specify as the owner
excludeuseridsFlagDescription: Salesforce IDs of the user you don't want to change as the campaing member's owner. Each Salesforce ID have to be joined by comma.
leadonlyFlagDescription: flag that only Leads will be processed.
errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the org '%s'.
